did.unittitle: John R. Commons "Accident Prevention, Health and Group Insurance" Manuscript, 1918
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Three chapters on accidents, group insurance, and health insurance by John R. Commons.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of three chapters on accidents, group insurance, and health insurance by John R. Commons. This unpublished manuscript was sent from Commons to H.A. Millis of the Health Insurance Commission in 1918.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: John R. Commons "Accident Prevention, Health and Group Insurance" Manuscript #5912m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
